title: Introducing OpenAI London
summary: OpenAI has announced the opening of its first international office in London, signaling the company's commitment to expanding its operations and bringing in diverse perspectives. The London office will focus on research, engineering, and go-to-market functions related to artificial general intelligence (AGI). The city's vibrant technology ecosystem and talent pool make it an ideal location for OpenAI's growth. The company sees this expansion as an opportunity to attract top talent and drive innovation in AGI development and policy. Open positions in London can be found on their careers page.
